mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Card ( connected_id, organization, card_name, issuer, res_card_no, card_password, res_card_type, res_sleep_yn, registered_at, user_id ) VALUES
( #{card.connectedId}, #{card.organization}, #{card.cardName}, #{card.issuer}, #{card.resCardNo}, #{card.cardPassword}, #{card.resCardType}, #{card.resSleepYn}, #{card.registeredAt}, #{card.userId} )
